testsuite.name: Configure SDK to authorize all requests using a specific access token
Inspect the access token which the SDK is using to authorize requests

testcase.name: Grant an access token with all permissions on all resource types with authorized uuid
Grant an access token without an authorized uuid
Grant an access token successfully with an authorized uuid
Attempt to grant an access token with all permissions empty or false and expect a server error
Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing a syntax error and expect a server error
Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing capturing groups and expect a server error
Validate that a token containing authorized uuid can be parsed correctly
Validate that a token containing uuid resource permissions can be parsed correctly
Validate that a token containing uuid pattern permissions can be parsed correctly

testsuite.name: provide an access token to the the SDK to authorize requests
Subscribing to a channel automatically connects
Unsubscribing to all Channels automatically disconnects
Subscribe Loop auto-retry with access denied
Receiving a message action added event
Receiving a channel metadata deleted event
Receiving a channel metadata set event
Receiving a user metadata deleted event
Receiving a user metadata set event
Can trigger the SDK to receive messages
Inspect the number of subsequent failed reconnection attempts
